sprykerComponent.name: product-card
sprykerComponent.readme:
Creates a block with product information: product labels, list of product group icons, product name, product rating and product price.

Code sample

{% include molecule('product-card') with {
    data: {
        name: 'name',
        abstractId: abstractId,
        url: 'url',
        imageUrl: 'imageUrl',
        price: 'price',
        originalPrice: 'originalPrice'
    }
} only %}

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
name: required,
    abstractId: required,
    url: required,
    imageUrl: required,
    price: null,
    originalPrice: null
